articles.title: Death, blindness and eyeballs removed after US eyedrops recall - BBC
articles.description: Patients lose vision and have eyes surgically removed after using eyedrops now recalled in the US.
articles.content:
US health officials say that eyedrops may have killed one person and severely injured several others due to drug-resistant bacterial contamination.
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CD… [+2569 chars]
